original_text:
when the Almighty was still with me
    and my children were around me,
korean_text: 그 때에는 전능자가 아직도 나와 함께 계셨으며 나의 젊은이들이 나를 둘러 있었으며

sentences.original_text: when the Almighty was still with me
sentences.korean_translation: 전능하신 분이 아직 나와 함께 계실 때

sentences.original_text: and my children were around me
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내 아이들이 내 주변에 있었을 때
